title.@value: Irritant contact dermatitis related to stoma or fistula

definition.@value: Irritant contact dermatitis of skin surrounding stomas or fistulas caused by prolonged or repeated contact with gastrointestinal secretions, faeces, urine, pus, mucus, or cleansing materials.

label.@value: Irritant contact dermatitis related to stoma or fistula
Irritant contact eczema related to stoma or fistula
